quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: If I’m excluded from rights, then that’s systemic discrimination.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, Ben, it is systemic when applied unequally.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Systemic means it’s not just mistakes, it’s the whole structure failing me.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, and I’ve raised that as a governance concern too.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Governance concern isn’t protection. I need safeguarding, not concern.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, Ben. You should have been safeguarded properly from the start.

contradictions.issue: Victim excluded from rights = systemic discrimination; advocate admits governance concern but no safeguarding delivered

timeline_hooks.link: Governance vs duty to protect contradiction
